translation.en: - [man] I'm here. - [exhaling] Jonas.
translation.ja: ここにいる ジョナス？

translation.en: - Yes, my love. - [sobs] It hurts.
translation.ja: そうだよ 苦しい

translation.en: - I know. - [panting]
translation.ja: 分かってる

translation.en: I need medicine.
translation.ja: 薬が欲しい

translation.en: I'm sorry, my love, there's no more time. It has to be now.
translation.ja: 時間がない　今しかないんだ

translation.en: [gasping sobs] Not ready. I'm too weak.
translation.ja: 無理よ　こんな体じゃ

translation.en: None of us were ever as strong as you.
translation.ja: 君は誰より強かった

translation.en: I don't want anyone else to die because of me.
translation.ja: 私のせいで 誰も死なせたくない

translation.en: They'll be hunted... born or unborn.
translation.ja: 彼らは いずれ狙われる 生まれる前から

translation.en: - [groans] - You can give them a fighting chance.
translation.ja: でも君ならチャンスをやれる

translation.en: [whispers] I see them.
translation.ja: 彼らが見える

translation.en: You did it.
translation.ja: よくやった

translation.en: Protect them.
translation.ja: 彼らを守って

translation.en: They're here.
translation.ja: 奴らだ

translation.en: - [tires screech outside] - So is he.
translation.ja: あいつも

translation.en: - Fight him. - I can't.
translation.ja: 闘うんだ できない

translation.en: So this is how you've been hiding from me?
translation.ja: これで私から逃げていたのか

translation.en: Does he know?
translation.ja: バレたか？

translation.en: You're giving birth.
translation.ja: 産みの苦しみか

translation.en: It's painful. I can feel it.
translation.ja: つらいだろう　分かるよ

translation.en: Whatever he's saying, remember what he has done.
translation.ja: 奴にされたことを忘れるな

translation.en: - [woman] Go. - Is that Jonas?
translation.ja: 行って ジョナスか？

translation.en: Please.
translation.ja: お願い

translation.en: Tell him I'm looking forward to meeting him.
translation.ja: 彼に伝えてくれ 会うのが楽しみだと

translation.en: I love you.
translation.ja: 愛してるよ

translation.en: - I love you. - Aw, does he know you're lying?
translation.ja: 愛してる 心にもないウソを

translation.en: Stop.
translation.ja: やめて

translation.en: Or is that still our little secret?
translation.ja: それとも彼には秘密か？

translation.en: Angelica.
translation.ja: アンジェリカ

translation.en: I-- I can't do it... not if you're here.
translation.ja: やっぱりできない あなたの前では

translation.en: I will always be here...
translation.ja: 僕はここにいる

translation.en: just as you will always be here.
translation.ja: 君がずっと ここにいるように

translation.en: Oh, come now, my dear,
translation.ja: まだ懲りてないのかい？

translation.en: how many times have you made that threat?
translation.ja: 何度も試したじゃないか

translation.en: - And we both know you won't do it. - [gasping breaths]
translation.ja: やれないのは分かってる

translation.en: You can't.
translation.ja: できないんだ

translation.en: You are one of us, and there's still so much work to be done.
translation.ja: 君は我々の仲間だ やることは山ほどある

translation.en: - You're coming home, with me. - [door opens]
translation.ja: うちに帰ろう　私と一緒に

translation.en: No.
translation.ja: イヤよ

translation.en: - Give me the gun. - Put the gun down.
translation.ja: 銃を 銃を下ろせ

translation.en: No. [sniffles]
translation.ja: イヤ

translation.en: Stop her!
translation.ja: よせ

translation.en: [girl whispers] Will, help me.
translation.ja: ウィル　助けて

translation.en: Will...
translation.ja: ウィル

translation.en: help me.
translation.ja: 助けて

translation.en: Please.
translation.ja: お願い

translation.en: [whispers] Help me.
translation.ja: 助けて

translation.en: OK.
translation.ja: 限界だ

translation.en: Hello?
translation.ja: すみません

translation.en: Hello? It's your neighbor.
translation.ja: 隣の者です

translation.en: Hey, open up! This is the police!
translation.ja: 開けろ　警察だ

translation.en: She can spin for a girl, can't she?
translation.ja: 女にしては やるだろ？

translation.en: She can spin.
translation.ja: すばらしいよ

translation.en: Period.
translation.ja: 別格だ

translation.en: Sure.
translation.ja: ああ

translation.en: I don't care. I didn't dress for you. I dressed for what is actually cool--
translation.ja: 何を着たっていいだろ 俺の好みだ

translation.en: Oh, hey, baby. Oh, hey... that set was on fire, man.
translation.ja: やあ ライリー 今夜は抜群だった

translation.en: Yeah, the vibe was crackin', Riles. It was like a... like a tight leash around me goolies.
translation.ja: ゾクゾクしたよ タマを縛られたみたいにさ

translation.en: Seen a lot of people play here. It doesn't feel like that.
translation.ja: 君ほどのＤＪは他にいない

translation.en: - Thank you. - This is the guy I was telling you about.
translation.ja: ありがとう 彼が例の人だ

translation.en: Everybody calls me Nyx.
translation.ja: ニックスと呼んで

translation.en: Gotta come with us, man. The shit that he has got
translation.ja: 彼が上物を持ってる

translation.en: has got the power to blow our fuckin' brains out. [chuckles]
translation.ja: 頭が吹っ飛ぶほどのヤツさ

translation.en: - Sorry, really bad migraine. - I get it. All that energy and emotion.
translation.ja: 私は頭痛が 分かるよ　疲労したんだ

translation.en: Tell him about your freak out in the park.
translation.ja: あの話をしてやれよ

translation.en: - Jacks, you fuckin' dick. - No, it's cool, man. Nyx, he gets it.
translation.ja: ジャックス　やめて 彼なら分かってくれる

translation.en: He said you had a vision.
translation.ja: 幻覚のこと？

translation.en: No, it was too many drugs.
translation.ja: ドラッグをやったせいよ

translation.en: My son?
translation.ja: ティノか

translation.en: Tino! Don't do this. Don't do this, I beg of you!
translation.ja: ティノ やめて　お願いよ

translation.en: I love you! I love you!
translation.ja: 愛してる 愛してるの

translation.en: - It's too late. - Tino.
translation.ja: もう遅い

translation.en: Have you come to confess your sins, my son?
translation.ja: 罪の告白に来たのか

translation.en: No, Padre.
translation.ja: 違う

translation.en: I've come to blow your fucking brains out.
translation.ja: 頭を吹っ飛ばしに来た

translation.en: What?
translation.ja: 何だって？

translation.en: I'm sorry, are we going off script?
translation.ja: 台本と違うぞ カット！

translation.en: Padre, take five.
translation.ja: 神父　休憩だ

translation.en: Lito, what is going on with you?
translation.ja: リト　どうしたんだよ

translation.en: Yesterday, you were having visions - of suicidal angels... - I'm sorry.
translation.ja: 昨日は 天使が自殺する幻を見て⸺

translation.en: ...and today you can't remember your lines.
translation.ja: 今日はセリフを間違う

translation.en: [softly] Are you OK, baby?
translation.ja: 大丈夫なのか？

translation.en: I don't know. I'm not feeling myself today.
translation.ja: 最近 自分らしくない

translation.en: I don't need you to be yourself.
translation.ja: お前らしくなくていい

translation.en: I need you to be this guy, Tino El Caído.
translation.ja: ティノ役になりきるんだ “エル･カイード”に

translation.en: - Right. - El Caído.
translation.ja: いいな？

translation.en: - Right, right. OK. - El Caído, cabrón!
translation.ja: 頼むぞ

translation.en: - Let's do it. - OK, people!
translation.ja: 撮ろう よし クローズアップの準備だ

translation.en: Let's set up for the close-up right here!
translation.ja: よし クローズアップの準備だ

translation.en: [woman over intercom] Ms. Bak, your brother's assistant called.
translation.ja: ソウル パクさん お電話がありました パクさん お電話がありました

translation.en: She said he still wasn't here, and Mr. Yuen has just arrived.
translation.ja: ユエン氏とのアポに 弟さんが来ないそうです

translation.en: I'll meet Mr. Yuen in the conference room.
translation.ja: 私が代わりに応対するわ

translation.en: Ni hao, Mr. Yuen.
translation.ja: どうも ユエンさん

translation.en: You do us a great service with your presence this morning.
translation.ja: ご足労に感謝いたします

translation.en: - Who are you? - I'm Sun Bak,
translation.ja: 君は？ 副社長で財務責任者の サン･パクです

translation.en: Vice President and Chief Financial Officer.
translation.ja: 副社長で財務責任者の サン･パクです

translation.en: Ahh. The sister.
translation.ja: なるほど　お姉さんか

translation.en: Where is your brother?
translation.ja: 弟さんは？

translation.en: He was... unavoidably detained.
translation.ja: やむない事情で 遅れております

translation.en: But I will be happy to walk you through our proposal.
translation.ja: よろしければ私が提案を

translation.en: Look, I'm here to close.
translation.ja: 大事な交渉なんだ

translation.en: Women don't close things.
translation.ja: 女じゃ相手にならん

translation.en: They open them.
translation.ja: ベッドでは別だがね

translation.en: Excuse me?
translation.ja: 何ですって？

translation.en: [voice echoes] If Joong-Ki is not here, that means Bak is not ready to--
translation.ja: ジュンキが不在なら 今回の話は白紙に…

translation.en: Tan-Wu! [chuckles] You sly old fox.
translation.ja: ユエンさん お盛んですね

translation.en: Did I see you at Min-Ji's? [continues indistinctly]
translation.ja: ミンジの店に行ったでしょ

translation.en: Hey, sis, go get us a couple coffees.
translation.ja: 姉さん　コーヒーを頼むよ

translation.en: Come this way.
translation.ja: こちらへ

translation.en: My nieces come downstairs, two little birds,
translation.ja: 姪(めい)っ子が２人 階段を下りてきて⸺

translation.en: they climb onto the couch, and cuddle up in my arms.
translation.ja: 俺に しがみつくんだよ

translation.en: Now we're close and all, but we've never done nothing like this in their lives.
translation.ja: そんなこと一度もなくてさ

translation.en: We didn't know it yet, but that exact moment,
translation.ja: それと同じ時 姉貴はスーパーにいて⸺

translation.en: my sister was at the supermarket, and she started bleeding bad.
translation.ja: それと同じ時 姉貴はスーパーにいて⸺ 血だらけになってた

translation.en: Something internal. There was blood everywhere,
translation.ja: 胎盤が変になったとかで 搬送されたんだが

translation.en: and they had to call an ambulance, but my nieces knew.
translation.ja: 胎盤が変になったとかで 搬送されたんだが 姪たちは ママが大変なのを知ってた

translation.en: - They knew about my sister. - Knew.
translation.ja: 姪たちは ママが大変なのを知ってた

translation.en: Somehow they just knew she was in trouble.
translation.ja: なぜか母親の危険を 感じてたわけだ

translation.en: Limbic resonance. It's a language older than our species.
translation.ja: 脳の共鳴だよ 太古からある現象さ

translation.en: He thinks that's what happened to you in the park, and it's all got to do with this chemical, DMT.
translation.ja: お前の幻覚も同じで ＤＭＴって物質のせいらしい

translation.en: [Nyx] It's a simple molecule present in all living things.
translation.ja: 生物の体内にある分子で⸺

translation.en: Scientists talk about it being part of an eco-biological synaptic network.
translation.ja: “自然界のシナプス･ 　ネットワーク”とされてる

translation.en: When people take it, they see their birth, their death, worlds beyond this one.
translation.ja: 自分の誕生や死 向こうの世界も見える

translation.en: They talk of truth...
translation.ja: そこには真実があり 絆があり⸺

translation.en: connection... transcendence.
translation.ja: そこには真実があり 絆があり⸺ 超越がある

translation.en: Dad? Dad, where are the umbrellas? I can't find the umbrellas.
translation.ja: パパ！ 傘をどこにやったの？

translation.en: What do you need an umbrella for?
translation.ja: どうして傘なんか

translation.en: Please, no jokes. I'm late already. I have a big meeting, and I can't show up dripping wet.
translation.ja: 大事な会議があるの ずぶ濡れじゃ困るわ

translation.en: Umbrellas are upstairs, but you don't need one.
translation.ja: 傘は上だが必要ないだろ

translation.en: Look, the sun is shining. It's going to be a beautiful day.
translation.ja: ごらん 太陽も出てるし いい天気になる

translation.en: But, I heard it.
translation.ja: でも聞こえたの

translation.en: Maybe you shouldn't be going to work. It's so close to the wedding.
translation.ja: 仕事は休みなさい 婚礼が近いんだ

translation.en: - Dad, you know work is important to me. - I know.
translation.ja: パパ　大事な仕事よ ああ

translation.en: You sent me to university to get a degree, not to find a husband.
translation.ja: そのために私を大学にまで

translation.en: - I know. - I heard thunder, and rain.
translation.ja: 雷が聞こえたのよ　雨音も

translation.en: Maybe what you heard was the sound of your father's tears,
translation.ja: お前が聞いたのは⸺ もうすぐ娘を嫁にやる 父親の涙声かも

translation.en: thinking how soon he is going to have to give his daughter away.
translation.ja: もうすぐ娘を嫁にやる 父親の涙声かも

translation.en: I thought you were happy I was getting married.
translation.ja: 結婚に賛成じゃないの？

translation.en: Tears can be happy... and sad.
translation.ja: 涙はうれしくても 悲しくても流れる

translation.en: We are born into this world the same way we shall leave it:
translation.ja: 人は生まれる時も⸺ この世を去る時も⸺

translation.en: alone.
translation.ja: 孤独です

translation.en: Our only comfort, the only presence that remains constant,
translation.ja: ただひとつ 我々の心を慰め 常に変わらぬものは⸺

translation.en: is the love of our Father in heaven.
translation.ja: 天にまします父の愛です

translation.en: You all right?
translation.ja: 大丈夫？

translation.en: Migraine.
translation.ja: 片頭痛だ

translation.en: I'm like Grandpa Hassan up there.
translation.ja: 俺は じいさんに似てる

translation.en: Cold and pickled?
translation.ja: 死人ってこと？

translation.en: I dream big, like he did.
translation.ja: でかい夢があるってことだ

translation.en: Nothing petty, like you two.
translation.ja: でかい夢があるってことだ お前らは⸺

translation.en: That's all you'll ever be, petty thieves. Not me.
translation.ja: 一生 コソ泥で終わる 俺は違う

translation.en: My next score is gonna be huge. Legendary.
translation.ja: 次に狙うのは伝説級のヤマだ

translation.en: When you hear about it, your dicks are gonna shrivel.
translation.ja: お前らが聞いたら アレが縮みあがるぜ

translation.en: I'm not sure what'll give me more pleasure... the money, or seeing his face.
translation.ja: あいつの驚く顔が見ものだ 金より そっちの方が 楽しみだよ

translation.en: My son.
translation.ja: カフィアス

translation.en: Why are you so good to me?
translation.ja: なぜ そんなに優しいの？

translation.en: You are my one and only mother.
translation.ja: 大事なお袋だからさ

translation.en: You gave me the light and love in my heart.
translation.ja: 俺の心に 勇気と愛を与えてくれた

translation.en: I have to go.
translation.ja: 仕事に行くよ

translation.en: Goodbye, my zebra.
translation.ja: 私のシマウマさん

translation.en: I have this feeling.
translation.ja: いい予感がする

translation.en: I'm going to have a really good day today.
translation.ja: いい１日になるよ

translation.en: "When the streets are a jungle, there can only be one king."
translation.ja: “街はジャングル 　キングは１人” “ヴァン･ダム”

translation.en: [woman moaning] Oh, God.
translation.ja: すごい

translation.en: Good?
translation.ja: よかった？

translation.en: - [chuckles] - Did that help honey's headache?
translation.ja: 頭痛も治った？

translation.en: I can't answer that,
translation.ja: 分からない

translation.en: because you literally just fucked my brains out.
translation.ja: 頭が吹っ飛ぶほどイッたから

translation.en: And here I always thought that was a figurative expression.
translation.ja: 文字どおり 頭が吹っ飛んだのね

translation.en: - Happy Pride. - Happy Pride.
translation.ja: ハッピー･プライド ハッピー･プライド

translation.en: Oh... come on.
translation.ja: こんな時に誰？

translation.en: It's Shawn. He's asking if I can work the charity box at the show tonight!
translation.ja: ショーンよ　今夜の会場で 募金係をやれって

translation.en: - I sense a costume opportunity. - Ah-- It's for a good cause.
translation.ja: コスプレできるわね 世のためよ

translation.en: Who are you?
translation.ja: お前は誰だ

translation.en: Who am I?
translation.ja: 誰かって？

translation.en: Blow your fucking brains out. Where's that coming from?
translation.ja: “頭を吹っ飛ばす”？ 　そんなセリフないぞ

translation.en: Tino El Caído. I'm the fallen one.
translation.ja: 俺は“地獄の使者”だ

translation.en: Who am I? I'm Tino El Caído.
translation.ja: 俺は？ 俺はティノだ

translation.en: I'm the fallen one.
translation.ja: 地獄の使者

translation.en: And you're a liar. You're a liar.
translation.ja: お前はウソつきだ

translation.en: I'm Tino El Caído.
translation.ja: 俺はティノ

translation.en: I'm Tino El Caído. I'm the fallen one.
translation.ja: エル･カイード　地獄の使者

translation.en: Diet Coke, please!
translation.ja: ダイエットコークを！

translation.en: What happened in my past nobody knows, not the writers, not the directors.
translation.ja: 俺の過去は 誰にも知られてない

translation.en: I'm a man-- Bah! Bah-pah!
translation.ja: 俺は…

translation.en: A man with a haunted past, that's what the script says.
translation.ja: “過去のある男”は役柄だ

translation.en: [sighing] What are you doing to me?
translation.ja: こんな時に…

translation.en: Just checking everything is OK.
translation.ja: 様子を見に来たの

translation.en: - Yeah? - Everything's OK.
translation.ja: 順調だよ

translation.en: I just thought maybe I did something wrong.
translation.ja: 私のこと怒ってない？

translation.en: No, no. Please, no. You were great. You were fantastic.
translation.ja: まさか　君はすばらしかった

translation.en: It was me that, you know, I...
translation.ja: 俺が おかしいんだ なんだか…

translation.en: You're just always so perfect.
translation.ja: いつも完璧なのに

translation.en: I don't know what is going on with me.
translation.ja: 何か変なんだ

translation.en: Maybe there's something that I can help you with?
translation.ja: 私が手伝いましょうか

translation.en: Wait, wait. Wait, Cassandra.
translation.ja: 待ってくれ　ダメだ

translation.en: There is nothing I'd like more.
translation.ja: そそられるけど⸺

translation.en: If only my heart did not belong to another.
translation.ja: 俺には大切な人がいる

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.ja: すまない

translation.en: - [sighs] - She's a very lucky woman.
translation.ja: 幸せな彼女ね

translation.en: I'm sorry. I...
translation.ja: 本当にごめん

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.ja: ごめんよ

translation.en: Thank you for coming. It means a lot to us.
translation.ja: 来てくれたのね　うれしいわ

translation.en: Sorry, Auntie.
translation.ja: 伯母さん

translation.en: Last few days, all he talked about was your father.
translation.ja: じいさんは死ぬ直前まで⸺

translation.en: Saddest day in his life, the day your father died.
translation.ja: アントンの死を悔やんでた

translation.en: You should go say hello. We'll wait for you.
translation.ja: お墓に行ってあげて 待ってるから

translation.en: Pay your respects. He was your father.
translation.ja: 敬意を払え お前の父親だぞ

translation.en: - Yes? - When are we leaving? - Right now. - I have to be downtown by nine.
translation.ja: いつ出るの？　９時までに街へ

translation.en: You'll be there long before nine, Ma'am. Come rain or shine, Van Damn is always on time.
translation.ja: 余裕で着きますよ うちは時間厳守なんで

translation.en: - We need to go. - We need more customers.
translation.ja: 出発だ 客を集めろ　赤字になる

translation.en: We're barely covering the cost of gas.
translation.ja: 客を集めろ　赤字になる

translation.en: We don't need customers, we need a Facebook page.
translation.ja: フェイスブックで宣伝しよう

translation.en: - Look at this. - [sighs] Jela.
translation.ja: 無理だよ

translation.en: Every day is the same. Everybody loves Bat Van.
translation.ja: 今日もあいつらは大繁盛だ

translation.en: You dumb fucks! No one gives a shit about Van Damn!
translation.ja: アホども ヴァン･ダムは人気ねえな

translation.en: - Maybe he's right. - No.
translation.ja: 確かにジャン=クロードは 落ち目だ

translation.en: - Maybe Jean-Claude's time is over. - No! Never!
translation.ja: 確かにジャン=クロードは 落ち目だ バカ言うな　カフィアス

translation.en: Come on, Capheus, Van Damme is a man.
translation.ja: バカ言うな　カフィアス ジャン=クロード･ ヴァン･ダムは本物の男だ

translation.en: He doesn't need costumes and gadgets to fight.
translation.ja: ジャン=クロード･ ヴァン･ダムは本物の男だ

translation.en: He fights with the fist and with his heart.
translation.ja: 拳とハートで闘う

translation.en: Come on! The Muscles from Brussels never die. Don't forget that.
translation.ja: ヴァン･ダム魂は不滅だ 忘れるなよ

translation.en: - Come on. - [speaks foreign language]
translation.ja: そうだな　客を集めろ

translation.en: - And get us more customers. - I will.
translation.ja: そうだな　客を集めろ 任せろ

translation.en: Jean Claude is watching over us. Yes, sir, are you going to the city?
translation.ja: さっそく客だ 街まで？

translation.en: - Yes, please. - Then take a seat.
translation.ja: お席へ

translation.en: - No, but I've got no money. - Um... Everyone must pay.
translation.ja: 金がないんだ でもタダでは…

translation.en: - Here. - What am I supposed to do with this?
translation.ja: これ どうしろと？

translation.en: This is worth more than the fare.
translation.ja: 運賃以上だ

translation.en: Look, I believe you, but how do I return change out of a chicken?
translation.ja: ニワトリじゃ釣りが出ないよ

translation.en: - Save me an egg. - [chicken squawking]
translation.ja: 卵でいい

translation.en: [woman] Ms. Bak, I have Mr. Jong from Seoul Citibank on the line again.
translation.ja: ソウル･シティバンクの チョン氏から またお電話が…

translation.en: [Sun] Tell Mr. Jong that I'm in a meeting.
translation.ja: 今は会議中だと伝えて

translation.en: Hang on. Riley! Hey!
translation.ja: ライリー

translation.en: Me and Nocker have been waitin' for you.
translation.ja: 待ってたんだぞ

translation.en: Sorry. I thought you'd gone already.
translation.ja: もう帰ったかと

translation.en: Nyx has invited us up to his place.
translation.ja: ニックスの家に招かれた

translation.en: Oh, look, maybe tomorrow, OK?
translation.ja: ごめん　明日にして

translation.en: Riles, this is important.
translation.ja: 大事なことだぞ

translation.en: Look, this headache is killing me.
translation.ja: 頭痛でつらいのよ

translation.en: Tomorrow, OK?
translation.ja: 明日にして

translation.en: OK...
translation.ja: だったら⸺

translation.en: The stuff that he's talking about, that is exactly what you need.
translation.ja: あいつの持ってるブツで ラクになれる

translation.en: - Hi! - Remember your first brownie?
translation.ja: あのブラウニー

translation.en: Our first Pride.
translation.ja: あの日が初めて

translation.en: Your lips... are so... amazing.
translation.ja: あなたの唇… とろけそうなほどステキ

translation.en: My God, we were so high.
translation.ja: 思い出した すごくハイに

translation.en: - [both giggling] - Oh, my God, we were.
translation.ja: ２人ともブッ飛んだわ

translation.en: [man] Are you following me?
translation.ja: お元気？

translation.en: - Need some delicious, nutritious stuff? - Um...
translation.ja: 栄養満点のブラウニーは いかが？

translation.en: Maybe this is what you need.
translation.ja: 食べとこうか

translation.en: - [man] Yeah. - OK, OK, we'll take one.
translation.ja: １つ もらうわ

translation.en: - [man 2] Go for it. - How much? You'll never be the same again.
translation.ja: 楽しんでね とっても効くわよ

translation.en: - OK, OK. OK, OK. - Thank you very much. Happy journey.
translation.ja: いい旅を

translation.en: - Happy Pride! - Happy Pride! Bye!
translation.ja: ハッピー･プライド　またね

translation.en: But you know what I remember best about that day?
translation.ja: あの日 何がうれしかったと思う？

translation.en: Hey, y'all, this is the one I've been talking about.
translation.ja: この子が例のカノジョよ

translation.en: Wait, I know you. You're the tranny that blogs about politics.
translation.ja: 政治ブログをやってる ニューハーフね

translation.en: I totally disagree with what you said about dropping LGBT.
translation.ja: “ＬＧＢＴ”を非難してる

translation.en: - Hey, come on, relax. It's a party. - We fought hard for that recognition.
translation.ja: 穏やかにいこうよ なぜ反対なの？

translation.en: I just thought that the distinctions were separating us.
translation.ja: 区別は対立を招くわ

translation.en: Bullshit. Just another colonizing male trying to take up any space left to women.
translation.ja: バカな 女を侵害する男と同じね

translation.en: Sam, say one more thing about my girlfriend and I will colonize your face with my fist.
translation.ja: それ以上言うと 顔をブン殴るよ

translation.en: - Oh, yeah? - I'm gonna go.
translation.ja: 帰るわ

translation.en: Oh, please. She's a loud-mouth Berkeley bitch.
translation.ja: 口だけ達者なビッチよ

translation.en: - Fuck you. - Fuck you!
translation.ja: くたばれ

translation.en: Hey, No-- Nomi!
translation.ja: ねえ ノミ！

translation.en: Wait! Honey, what is it? You never cry at stuff like that.
translation.ja: 待って　どうしたの この程度で泣くなんて

translation.en: I'm not crying because of her.
translation.ja: 彼女のせいじゃない

translation.en: Then what?
translation.ja: 何なの？

translation.en: I'm crying because no one's ever defended me before.
translation.ja: あなたが本気で かばってくれたから

translation.en: That's the day I knew I'd always love you.
translation.ja: あの日 愛を確信したの

translation.en: My Lord Ganesha.
translation.ja: ガネーシャ様

translation.en: I hope you like this modak.
translation.ja: モーダカをどうぞ

translation.en: I made it especially for you.
translation.ja: 特別に作ったんです

translation.en: I put peanuts on top. [chuckles]
translation.ja: ピーナツも添えて

translation.en: I mean, of course, these gifts come without any attachments or obligations.
translation.ja: もちろん下心があっての お供えではありません

translation.en: I am trying to become a better person.
translation.ja: いい人間になりたくて…

translation.en: I know I am not important enough to deserve your attention
translation.ja: 私に構うほど お暇でないのは承知です

translation.en: when there are so many terrible things wrong in this world.
translation.ja: この世は悲劇ばかりですから

translation.en: I can't tell you how bad I feel even being here,
translation.ja: 後ろめたさも感じています

translation.en: because I know I shouldn't be asking you this.
translation.ja: こんなお願いは 図々しいからです

translation.en: But I have no one else to turn to.
translation.ja: でも誰にも頼れなくて

translation.en: OK, um... this weekend,
translation.ja: 実は⸺ 今週末 私は立派な男性に 嫁ぎます

translation.en: I am to marry a very important man, who you probably know, Rajan Rasal.
translation.ja: 今週末 私は立派な男性に 嫁ぎます 名前はラジャン･ラサル

translation.en: Um, he is the son of the owner of the pharmaceutical company where I work.
translation.ja: 私が勤める製薬会社の 御曹司です

translation.en: He's very smart and very handsome,
translation.ja: 頭がよくて ハンサムで⸺

translation.en: and all the women at the company want desperately to marry him,
translation.ja: お嫁さんになりたい女性は 大勢いるのに⸺

translation.en: but he never took an interest in anyone...
translation.ja: 彼は眼中にありません

translation.en: except me.
translation.ja: 私のこと以外は

translation.en: I should tell you, I have never seen my parents so full of joy
translation.ja: あんなに喜ぶ両親は 初めて見ました

translation.en: as when they received his proposal.
translation.ja: 彼が求婚した時です

translation.en: I mean, I thought they were excited when I received my degree from university.
translation.ja: 私が大学を卒業した時より ずっと喜びました

translation.en: Maybe you saw my dad, like, dancing around the house.
translation.ja: 父は踊り出すほど 幸せそうで…

translation.en: How could I say no?
translation.ja: それを断れますか？

translation.en: I mean, Rajan is, according to everyone, including my mom's astrologer,
translation.ja: ラジャンは 理想の結婚相手だと⸺ 母の占い師まで 太鼓判を押してます

translation.en: the perfect husband for me.
translation.ja: 母の占い師まで 太鼓判を押してます

translation.en: Except for one little fact.
translation.ja: でも１つだけ問題が…

translation.en: I do not love him.
translation.ja: 彼を愛してません

translation.en: After you left the funeral... Sergei started blowing on about your dad.
translation.ja: 葬式のあとで⸺ お前の伯父さんに聞いたよ

translation.en: Said there wasn't a better box man in the world than your dad, now or ever.
translation.ja: 親父さんのアントンは 世界一の金庫破りだったと

translation.en: Said the only reason your dad got caught
translation.ja: そんな親父さんが 捕まったのは⸺

translation.en: was because he was obsessed with trying to crack an S&D safe.
translation.ja: そんな親父さんが 捕まったのは⸺ Ｓ＆Ｄの金庫に執着したから

translation.en: Said they're uncrackable.
translation.ja: 開かずの金庫に⸺

translation.en: Said your father was an idiot for trying.
translation.ja: 挑戦したからだって

translation.en: You sure that gets us in?
translation.ja: これで入れるのか？

translation.en: Am I sure? You notice the sign outside?
translation.ja: 俺は鍵のプロだぜ

translation.en: See you tomorrow.
translation.ja: じゃ明日

translation.en: Wolfgang?
translation.ja: ヴォルフガング

translation.en: The safe in the house, it's one of them S&D's, isn't it?
translation.ja: 今回のヤマの金庫 Ｓ＆Ｄなんだろ？

translation.en: - [dance music playing] - Give 'til it hearts, baby.
translation.ja: 入れてちょうだい

translation.en: My box needs filling!
translation.ja: 愛を待ってるよ

translation.en: Mm, thank you, baby.
translation.ja: ありがと ベイビー

translation.en: Hi!
translation.ja: あら

translation.en: - Oh! - Wow, she is amazing.
translation.ja: アマニタはすごいね

translation.en: Neets loves her charity work.
translation.ja: 慈善活動が大好きなの

translation.en: - Thanks for coming. - Oh, my God, of course.
translation.ja: よく来たね あなたの新作が楽しみ

translation.en: - We're so excited to see your new piece. - A bit nervous about it, actually.
translation.ja: あなたの新作が楽しみ 実は不安なんだ

translation.en: - Why? - Well, it's kind of a downer.
translation.ja: どうして 気が滅入るような内容だから

translation.en: - So? - This is Pride. People want to feel good.
translation.ja: いけない？ “プライド”は祭典だ

translation.en: I don't.
translation.ja: そうかしら

translation.en: During the '80s, Pride was a funeral march.
translation.ja: 80年代には追悼の場だった

translation.en: I know. I want to remember that. I want to connect to that.
translation.ja: 僕もそれを語り継ぎたい

translation.en: I want to show people how my life and all of this
translation.ja: 今のゲイ文化を 享受できるのは⸺

translation.en: is made possible by those lives and those deaths.
translation.ja: 死んだ仲間たちの おかげだとね

translation.en: [man] I walked in the room and saw a man in his early 30s
translation.ja: 部屋にいた男は⸺ 30代前半なのに 見た目は92歳

translation.en: who looked like he was 92,
translation.ja: 30代前半なのに 見た目は92歳

translation.en: who was skin and bones, who weighed maybe 80 pounds,
translation.ja: やせ細って 体重は35キロほど

translation.en: who was on a respirator.
translation.ja: 呼吸器をつけてた

translation.en: [sighs] And, uh... [voice breaking] and he said, he said to me...
translation.ja: そんな彼が 僕に向かって言うんだ

translation.en: "Do me this-- You've gotta do me a favor."
translation.ja: “君に頼みがある”

translation.en: And I said, "Whatever it is, just ask."
translation.ja: 僕は“何でも聞くよ”と答えた

translation.en: And he said, "I can't go on like this."
translation.ja: すると彼は “こんな風に生きていけない”

translation.en: He said, "You know, I just-- If you could, just carry me up to the roof
translation.ja: すると彼は “こんな風に生きていけない” “できることなら⸺” “僕を屋根まで運んで 　落としてくれ”

translation.en: and throw me over the... roof."
translation.ja: “僕を屋根まで運んで 　落としてくれ”

translation.en: He goes, "I only weigh about 80 pounds, and you're strong, you could do it."
translation.ja: “屋根の上から” “僕は35キロだ 　たくましい君ならできる”

translation.en: And then I said, "Jay, I can't do that. You can't ask that of me."
translation.ja: 僕は答えた “そんなことできないよ”

translation.en: And when he died, they came in... in hazmat... [voice breaks] suits,
translation.ja: 彼が息絶えると⸺ 感染防護服の連中が やって来て⸺

translation.en: and they put him in a body bag.
translation.ja: 彼を死体袋に入れた

translation.en: It's like I was there.
translation.ja: すごくリアルなんだ

translation.en: I could feel the wind coming in through the broken windows.
translation.ja: 窓から吹き込む風とか⸺

translation.en: The smell of burnt mattress. It didn't seem like a dream.
translation.ja: においも感じた 夢とは思えなくて

translation.en: Maybe you were astro-projecting, like Dr. Strange.
translation.ja: ｢ドクター･ストレンジ｣ みたいだな

translation.en: Why would I expect anything different from you?
translation.ja: 漫画の話じゃない

translation.en: - Officer Strange. - Fuck off.
translation.ja: ストレンジ巡査 よせ ストレンジ巡査だ これからそう呼ぶよ

translation.en: Officer Strange. Whoo! That's your name.
translation.ja: ストレンジ巡査だ これからそう呼ぶよ

translation.en: Every time I come down here, I remember how much you can actually feel how much they hate us.
translation.ja: ここを通るたび 警察への敵意を感じる

translation.en: Gangbangers hate cops, cops hate gangbangers. It's natural.
translation.ja: ギャングと警察の関係なら それが自然さ

translation.en: How's that natural?
translation.ja: 自然って？

translation.en: Like dogs hate cats. They're the enemy.
translation.ja: 犬と猫みたいに 敵同士ってこと

translation.en: You certainly got plenty of reason to hate them. After what they did to your old man?
translation.ja: お前も憎いだろ 親父さんにあんなこと…

translation.en: Shit, I'd never forgive something like that.
translation.ja: 俺なら絶対に許せない

translation.en: [man over radio] One-Adam-12, we have a report of gunfire.
translation.ja: １Ａ12　発砲の通報です

translation.en: Eleven-12, 10-4.
translation.ja: 急行します

translation.en: With any luck, there'll be a few less cats in the world.
translation.ja: うまくいけば猫を減らせる

translation.en: - Let's get 'em, cowboy. - [siren wailing]
translation.ja: 行くぞ

translation.en: Open sesame.
translation.ja: 開けゴマ

translation.en: Was that a siren?
translation.ja: サイレンの音か？

translation.en: Huh? Didn't hear anything.
translation.ja: 聞こえないよ

translation.en: You know I brought a drill.
translation.ja: ドリルを使うか？

translation.en: There's no shame in drilling.
translation.ja: 別に恥じゃない

translation.en: Shots fired. Requesting backup.
translation.ja: 発砲だ　応援を頼む

translation.en: Help me.
translation.ja: 助けて

translation.en: - [man] What happened? - [boy panting]
translation.ja: どうした

translation.en: Gunshot wound. Looks like a hollow point.
translation.ja: 撃たれてる ホローポイント弾だ

translation.en: - Get an ambulance. - What?
translation.ja: 救急車を

translation.en: - You heard me. - What do you think this is, TV?
translation.ja: 聞こえたろ シカゴの下町だぞ

translation.en: Ain't no ambulance coming to Chi-raq for a gunshot.
translation.ja: 撃たれても救急車は来ない

translation.en: Not fast enough to make a difference anyway.
translation.ja: 来ても手遅れだ

translation.en: The fuck you doing, Gorski?
translation.ja: 何してんだ

translation.en: Hey. What's your name, kid?
translation.ja: これを当てろ　名前は？

translation.en: - Deshawn. - Deshawn, I'm Will.
translation.ja: デショーン 俺はウィルだ

translation.en: I need you to press this as hard as you can.
translation.ja: 強く押さえろ

translation.en: Hey, hey, hey, hey. Press as hard as you can.
translation.ja: いいか　なるべく強くだ

translation.en: - Are you kidding me? - [Will grunts]
translation.ja: 冗談だろ

translation.en: I know you, Diego. You do not want to stand there and let this kid die either.
translation.ja: ディエゴ 見殺しにできないだろ？

translation.en: That's what he'd do if it was you or me.
translation.ja: 逆なら そうされる

translation.en: Goddamnit.
translation.ja: 勘弁しろよ

translation.en: Fifty-eight minutes.
translation.ja: あと58分

translation.en: Fuck.
translation.ja: クソッ

translation.en: Hey, hey, hey. Hey.
translation.ja: おい

translation.en: Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa.
translation.ja: 待てよ

translation.en: What's this?
translation.ja: 何してる

translation.en: We're throwing in the towel?
translation.ja: 降参するのか？

translation.en: I need a break.
translation.ja: ひと休みだ

translation.en: Hey, you understand we got less than an hour, unless I'm wrong and Steiner's early, then we got less than that.
translation.ja: 俺の読みが外れて シュタイナーが早く来るかも

translation.en: You're never wrong about shit like that.
translation.ja: お前の読みは外れない

translation.en: - [dance music plays on TV] - [audience cheers]
translation.ja: ｢ユーロ･オーディション｣

translation.en: Really?
translation.ja: マジかよ

translation.en: [whispers] Really?
translation.ja: マジ？

translation.en: It relaxes me.
translation.ja: 気分が落ち着く

translation.en: This shit relaxes you?
translation.ja: こんな番組で？

translation.en: - Hang on. - [tires screeching]
translation.ja: がんばれ

translation.en: - [Will] You OK? - Just a little cold.
translation.ja: 大丈夫か？ 寒気がする

translation.en: [boy] This your first time in the back seat, Will?
translation.ja: パトカーの後ろは初めて？

translation.en: I've been back here more times than I care to admit.
translation.ja: 何度も乗ったよ

translation.en: [groans] Are you some sort of gangsta cop or somethin'?
translation.ja: 昔はワルだったとか？

translation.en: Old man's police. Had my fair share of teenage rebellion, I guess.
translation.ja: 親父が警官で ガキの頃は反抗してた

translation.en: Never met my dad. He was shot before I was born.
translation.ja: うちの親父は 俺が生まれる前に銃で…

translation.en: This girl, she's really good.
translation.ja: この子はすごくうまい

translation.en: Her name's Natalie. I watched her last week.
translation.ja: ナタリーだ　先週も見た

translation.en: She sings like a musical instrument.
translation.ja: 楽器みたいに歌うんだ

translation.en: She uses a language of pure emotion.
translation.ja: 純粋な感情が伝わってくる

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, she's good.
translation.ja: 確かにうまいよ

translation.en: - She's never gonna win. - Why?
translation.ja: でも優勝はない どうして

translation.en: Her eyes are too close together. She looks like a camel.
translation.ja: 目が寄りすぎてる ラクダみたいだ

translation.en: [Wolfgang] Shut up.
translation.ja: 黙ってろ

translation.en: Camel's never gonna win.
translation.ja: ラクダは勝てない

translation.en: Never.
translation.ja: 絶対に

translation.en: - [low murmurs in audience] - [woman whispers] Wolfgang.
translation.ja: ヴォルフガング

translation.en: [woman whispers] Wolfgang.
translation.ja: ヴォルフガング

translation.en: - [sighs] - Told you.
translation.ja: ほらな

translation.en: Emergency! Kid's bleeding bad here.
translation.ja: 急患だ　かなり出血してる

translation.en: - That's a gunshot. - Yeah, I know.
translation.ja: 撃たれたのね

translation.en: - I'm sorry, we can't treat that here. - What?
translation.ja: 処置できないわ

translation.en: Are you new? You need to go and get an ambulance and take him to Mt. Sinai.
translation.ja: 知らないの？ 受け入れ病院へ運んで

translation.en: The kid's gonna be dead before we get there.
translation.ja: 手遅れになる

translation.en: - I'm sorry. It's policy. - What kind of policy lets a kid die?
translation.ja: 悪いけど決まりなの 死なせるのが？

translation.en: We were losing so many resources to gunshots,
translation.ja: 銃のケガ人を 受け入れてたら⸺

translation.en: we couldn't take care of all the other patients that needed help around here.
translation.ja: 他の患者の行き場がなくなる

translation.en: We've been a better hospital since we stopped taking kids like him.
translation.ja: まともな病院では 断るしかないの

translation.en: - [boy panting] - [Will] Please.
translation.ja: 頼むよ

translation.en: Please.
translation.ja: 頼む

translation.en: That's it.
translation.ja: 時間切れだ

translation.en: Fuck. It's over. Hey.
translation.ja: クソッ 終わりだ

translation.en: Shit.
translation.ja: ヤバい

translation.en: It's Steiner! We gotta go.
translation.ja: シュタイナーが来た

translation.en: Hey, Wolfgang.
translation.ja: ヴォルフガング

translation.en: Please. He's going to fucking kill us.
translation.ja: 頼むよ　あいつに殺される

translation.en: I don't want to die!
translation.ja: 死にたくないよ

translation.en: - You cracked the uncrackable. - [sighs]
translation.ja: 開かずの金庫なのに

translation.en: You did it.
translation.ja: 開けちまった

translation.en: Dr. Manno just came out of surgery. Life signs are stable.
translation.ja: 今 手術が終わった 容体は安定してる

translation.en: He'll probably make it.
translation.ja: たぶん助かるわ

translation.en: OK.
translation.ja: よかった

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.ja: ありがとう

translation.en: Can I ask you a personal question?
translation.ja: 立ち入ったことだけど…

translation.en: If he lives and he kills someone, let's say a cop,
translation.ja: もし あの子が将来 警官を殺したら⸺

translation.en: how you gonna feel about that?
translation.ja: あなたはどう思う？

translation.en: You all right?
translation.ja: 大丈夫？

translation.en: You're sweating.
translation.ja: 汗ばんでる

translation.en: - Your pulse is racing. - I'm fine.
translation.ja: 脈も速い 平気よ

translation.en: You're scared.
translation.ja: おびえてる

translation.en: You needn't be.
translation.ja: その必要はない

translation.en: You're so beautiful.
translation.ja: 君は美しい

translation.en: I don't just mean in a physical way.
translation.ja: 見た目だけじゃない

translation.en: The warmth... pouring out of your heart.
translation.ja: 温かさが⸺ 心からあふれてる

translation.en: Even though you work hard to hide it.
translation.ja: 隠したって分かる

translation.en: You don't belong with these men.
translation.ja: あいつらとは違う

translation.en: You know it's true.
translation.ja: 君も自覚してる

translation.en: Don't you?
translation.ja: そうだろ？

translation.en: I used to be like you.
translation.ja: 昔の俺に似てる

translation.en: Like an exposed nerve of a broken tooth.
translation.ja: むき出しの神経みたいに 感じやすくて

translation.en: I used anything I could to insulate.
translation.ja: 現実逃避ばかりしてた

translation.en: Music... books... booze.
translation.ja: 音楽や⸺ 書物 薬に

translation.en: Anything I could to keep myself separate from the rest of the world.
translation.ja: 没頭することで 自分を世界から隔離した

translation.en: Eventually I felt protected, you know, I...
translation.ja: 壁に守られてるようで⸺

translation.en: I felt safe.
translation.ja: 安心できた

translation.en: But also...
translation.ja: でも同時に⸺

translation.en: I never felt so... completely alone.
translation.ja: どうしようもないほど 孤独でもあった

translation.en: Then one day a friend, she gave me a gift.
translation.ja: そんなある日 女友達が贈り物をくれた

translation.en: She took away my armor. She tore down my walls.
translation.ja: おかげで俺は鎧(よろい)を捨て 壁を破った

translation.en: Her gift... it reminded me
translation.ja: その贈り物は 俺に思い出させてくれた

translation.en: what it felt like... to be alive.
translation.ja: 生きるってことが どんな感覚かを

translation.en: What did she give you?
translation.ja: 何をもらったの？

translation.en: This.
translation.ja: これさ

translation.en: - Stop the car. - Hm?
translation.ja: 止めろ

translation.en: - I said stop the car! - What the fuck?
translation.ja: 止めてくれ 何だよ

translation.en: This is where it happened.
translation.ja: ここで起こった

translation.en: What happened?
translation.ja: 何が？

translation.en: It's where she killed herself.
translation.ja: 彼女が自殺した

translation.en: [mutters] Shit.
translation.ja: まったく

translation.en: This is it.
translation.ja: ここだ

translation.en: Ah, hell no.
translation.ja: 勘弁してくれ

translation.en: This wasn't a dream.
translation.ja: 夢じゃなかった

translation.en: Of all the partners, I end up with a Mulder-wannabe.
translation.ja: ｢Ｘ-ファイル｣のモルダーかよ

translation.en: - D, a woman killed herself right here. - Where's the blood, Will?
translation.ja: ここで自殺した 血がないぞ

translation.en: Maybe she only shot herself in the fifth dimension, so we can't see the blood.
translation.ja: ５次元の出来事だから 見えないとか？

translation.en: OK, I've never been here before.
translation.ja: ここは初めて来た

translation.en: I know about this.
translation.ja: でも知ってる

translation.en: Drugs.
translation.ja: 薬だ

translation.en: There's a gun, too.
translation.ja: 銃もあるはず

translation.en: There's shit everywhere, man.
translation.ja: そういう場所だ

translation.en: Look, you're freakin' me out.
translation.ja: 落ち着こうぜ

translation.en: Show me evidence of a crime, and you got me.
translation.ja: 犯罪の証拠は？ 証拠があれば信じてやるよ

translation.en: So, until then, do your little séance, and I'll be in the car. All right?
translation.ja: 証拠があれば信じてやるよ でもオカルト話なら 俺は車で待ってる

translation.en: Uh... Hi.
translation.ja: やあ

translation.en: This is where she died.
translation.ja: ここで彼女が死んだ

translation.en: Did you know her?
translation.ja: 知り合い？

translation.en: How do you know she died here?
translation.ja: なぜ そのことを？

translation.en: I saw her.
translation.ja: 見たの

translation.en: Do you live here?
translation.ja: 家は近所？

translation.en: Where do you live?
translation.ja: どこから？

translation.en: London.
translation.ja: ロンドン

translation.en: What are you doing here?
translation.ja: ここで何を？

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.ja: 分からない

translation.en: I don't know where I am.
translation.ja: ここがどこかも…

translation.en: Chicago, near South Side.
translation.ja: シカゴだよ サウスサイドの近く

translation.en: In America?
translation.ja: アメリカなの？

translation.en: I've never been to America.
translation.ja: アメリカは初めて

translation.en: [gasps] Oh, no! What are you doing?
translation.ja: ウソでしょ　何してるの？

translation.en: - Don't you fucking move! - [gasping]
translation.ja: 動くんじゃねえ！

translation.en: - Stop. - Open the fucking safe!
translation.ja: よせ 金庫を開けろ

translation.en: Why are you doing this?
translation.ja: なぜこんな…

translation.en: He has just had a shipment come in, and me and Nocker have been trackin' it.
translation.ja: 前からこいつのブツを 狙ってたのさ

translation.en: We were gonna hit him yesterday, but he wanted you here.
translation.ja: 都合よく部屋に入れたしな

translation.en: Up-bup-bup-bup-bup.
translation.ja: ほら 立て

translation.en: Now, a smart guy like you... probably has a gun in there.
translation.ja: あんたは頭がいい 銃を隠してるな？

translation.en: - [gasps] Don't hurt him. - Oh, yeah.
translation.ja: やめて そうか

translation.en: Is that why you came? 'Cause you wanna-- Do you wanna fuck him?
translation.ja: こいつが好きか ヤリたいのか？

translation.en: Riles, he will kill you without blinking if I didn't have this.
translation.ja: 俺が銃を持ってなきゃ お前は殺されてた

translation.en: - I fuckin' told you. Here. - I have to go.
translation.ja: やっぱり銃だ 帰るわ

translation.en: No, no, no, no, no. Riley. You're not-- You're not going anywhere.
translation.ja: 自分だけ逃げるのか？ 仲間だろ

translation.en: - You're part of this. No, no, no. - [panting] Let me go.
translation.ja: 自分だけ逃げるのか？ 仲間だろ 帰らせて

translation.en: Riles, Riles... this is the break that we've been waiting for.
translation.ja: ライリー これは待望のチャンスなんだ

translation.en: Fill it up.
translation.ja: 入れろ

translation.en: Fill it up!
translation.ja: 急げ！

translation.en: Riles, this is our chance.
translation.ja: ライリー 俺たちの夢がかなうんだぞ

translation.en: You said that you wanted to go to America. We wanted a different life.
translation.ja: アメリカに行きたいだろ？ 人生を再出発させるんだよ

translation.en: That's-- That's what you said, right?
translation.ja: 人生を再出発させるんだよ そうだろ？
